entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Rain near the river this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
